inclusion.criterion: OSA defined by the International classification of Sleep Disorders-322 diagnostic criteria with moderate-to-severe disease, i.e. apnea hypopnea index (AHI) 15* per hour by polysomnography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Moderate-to-severe COPD defined by GOLD 2 and 3 (Global Obstructive Lung Disease) criteria with FEV1/FVC ratio <70% and FEV1 >30% and <80% of predicted based on PFT
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of COPD and OSA, which are both moderate-to-severe. They also meet the age criterion. However, they do not have mild COPD or are current smokers.
